meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of ozone.
meanings.sent1: The ozonic smell after a thunderstorm is refreshing.
meanings.sent2: The air purifier creates an ozonic atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent3: The ozonic breeze made everyone feel energized.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was ozonic, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The ozonic aura of the forest invigorated the hikers.

meanings.sent1: The ozonic layer protects us from harmful UV rays.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ozonic characteristics of the gas.
meanings.sent3: The ozonic qualities of the new fabric amazed the designers.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an ozonic clarity that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The ozonic properties of the plant help in purifying the air.

meanings.sent1: The ozonic generator releases ozone into the air.
meanings.sent2: The ozonic emissions from the factory were concerning.
meanings.sent3: The ozonic levels in the laboratory were carefully monitored.
meanings.sent4: The ozonic machine efficiently produced ozone for the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The ozonic chamber was used to test ozone reactions.
